code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Button,Stack,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExerciseCard=_ref=>{let{exercise}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"exercise-card",to:"/exercise/".concat(exercise.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:exercise.gifUrl,alt:exercise.name,loading:"lazy",className:"icon-animation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{sx:{ml:'21px',color:'#fff',background:'#FFA9A9',fontSize:'14px',borderRadius:'20px',textTransform:'capitalize','&:hover':{background:'#ff6161'}},children:exercise.bodyPart}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{sx:{ml:'21px',color:'#fff',background:'#FCC757',fontSize:'14px',borderRadius:'20px',textTransform:'capitalize','&:hover':{background:'#ffd46f'}},children:exercise.target})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{ml:"21px",color:"#e0e0e0",fontWeight:"bold",sx:{fontSize:{lg:'24px',xs:'20px'}},mt:"11px",pb:"10px",textTransform:"capitalize",children:exercise.name})]});};export default ExerciseCard;
